data.title: WHLM Radio Advertising Costs
data.meta_description: How much does it cost to advertise on WHLM-FM. Find radio advertising rates for WHLM-FM in Pennsylvania.
data.text:
How much does radio advertising cost on WHLM-FM? We've got the information you need!

Why Advertise on WHLM?

By advertising on WHLM-FM, you can reach a large audience of potential buyers in the Wilkes Barre-Scranton, PA area. It is owned by Columbia Broadcasting Co. The radio station format is classic hits. To learn more, tune in to 103.5 FM.

Radio Advertising Rate for WHLM-FM

The estimated ad rate for the radio station is $48.00. Note: Individual radio station rates are not readily available. Our estimates are based on regional averages and may be very inaccurate. Advertising rate estimates are typically for a 30 second spot. Seasonal factors and volume discounts should also be considered. Contact the radio station's advertising department for an exact quote on their current rates. In some cases, our estimated rates may be significantly different from the actual current rates...so be sure to get your ad prices from the station before completing your budgeting.

To buy an ad or to receive more information on radio advertising rates, please contact WHLM-FM at (570) 784-1200.

WHLM-FM Contact Information

WHLM-FM

124 E Main St

Bloomsburg, PA 17815

Phone: (570) 784-1200

Fax: (570) 784-6060

To update or correct radio advertising information on this page, please use the link below:

Claim This Page
